Views Documentation

This section contains documentation for all views in the ITAssetManagement application.

View Types

  • Layout Views: Base templates that define the common structure and elements shared across multiple pages
  • Partial Views: Reusable view components that can be included in other views
  • Page Views: Individual page templates for specific features and functionality

Directory Structure

  • /Views
    • /Shared: Common layouts, partials, and components
    • /Home: Home page and dashboard views
    • /Assignments: Views for managing asset assignments
    • /Laptops: Views for managing laptop inventory
    • /Users: Views for user management
    • /Account: Authentication and user profile views

Conventions

  1. All views follow the _Layout.cshtml base template
  2. Partial views are prefixed with "_" (underscore)
  3. Each controller has its corresponding view folder
  4. View names match their action method names in controllers

Common View Components

  • Navigation bar
  • Sidebar menu
  • Footer
  • Alert messages
  • Modal dialogs
  • Forms and input components

View Features

  • Responsive design for mobile and desktop
  • Bootstrap 5 styling
  • Form validation
  • Dynamic data rendering
  • AJAX support for async operations
  • QR code integration
  • Search and filtering components
  • Edit this page
